verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

בְּיוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> day הַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> On the first בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> of the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month תָּקִ֕ים <S%H6965><s%> shalt thou set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁכַּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְשַׂמְתָּ֣ <S%H7760><s%> And thou shalt put שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> therein אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony וְסַכֹּתָ֥ <S%H5526><s%> and cover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> the ark אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> with the vail

וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָ֔ן <S%H7979><s%> in the table וְעָרַכְתָּ֖ <S%H6186><s%> and set in order אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֶרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H6187><s%> the things that are to be set in order וְהֵבֵאתָ֙ <S%H935><s%> upon it and thou shalt bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנֹרָ֔ה <S%H4501><s%> in the candlestick וְהַעֲלֵיתָ֖ <S%H5927><s%> and light אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֵרֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5216><s%> the lamps

וְנָתַתָּ֞ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הַזָּהָב֙ <S%H2091><s%> of gold לִקְטֹ֔רֶת <S%H7004><s%> for the incense לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <S%H7760><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֥ךְ <S%H4539><s%> the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> of the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> to the tabernacle

וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt set אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הָעֹלָ֑ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> before פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> the door מִשְׁכַּ֥ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tent מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְנָֽתַתָּ֙ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיֹּ֔ר <S%H3595><s%> the laver בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> between the tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> between הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar וְנָתַתָּ֥ <S%H5414><s%> and shalt put שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> in it מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> water

וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> And thou shalt set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> the court סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ <S%H5414><s%> and hang up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֖ךְ <S%H4539><s%> the hanging שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הֶחָצֵֽר׃ <S%H2691><s%> at the court

וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <S%H4888><s%> the anointing וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> and anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֑וֹ וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H6942><s%> and all that [is] therein and shalt hallow אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> it and all the vessels וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> thereof and it shall be holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֛ <S%H4886><s%> And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> of the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all כֵּלָ֑יו <S%H3627><s%> and all his vessels וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctify אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> and it shall be an altar קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> most קָֽדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H6944><s%> holy

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> And thou shalt anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכִּיֹּ֖ר <S%H3595><s%> the laver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כַּנּ֑וֹ <S%H3653><s%> and his foot וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֖ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctify אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהִקְרַבְתָּ֤ <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֔יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְרָחַצְתָּ֥ <S%H7364><s%> and wash אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> them with water

וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H3847><s%> And thou shalt put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> upon Aaron אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for בִּגְדֵ֣י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֥ <S%H4886><s%> and anoint אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְקִדַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H6942><s%> him and sanctify אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְכִהֵ֥ן <S%H3547><s%> him that he may minister unto me in the priest's office לִֽי׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֖יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons תַּקְרִ֑יב <S%H7126><s%> And thou shalt bring וְהִלְבַּשְׁתָּ֥ <S%H3847><s%> and clothe אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> כֻּתֳּנֹֽת׃ <S%H3801><s%> them with coats

וּמָשַׁחְתָּ֣ <S%H4886><s%> And thou shalt anoint אֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> you מָשַׁ֙חְתָּ֙ <S%H4886><s%> them as thou didst anoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> their father וְכִהֲנ֖וּ <S%H3547><s%> that they may minister unto me in the priest's office לִ֑י וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> will qualify לִהְיֹ֨ת <S%H1961><s%> will qualify לָהֶ֧ם מָשְׁחָתָ֛ם <S%H4888><s%> for their anointing לִכְהֻנַּ֥ת <S%H3550><s%> priesthood עוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> shall surely be an everlasting לְדֹרֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1755><s%> throughout their generations

וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Thus did מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשָֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> him so did ס

וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> become בַּחֹ֧דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֛וֹן <S%H7223><s%> And it came to pass in the first בַּשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> in the second בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month הוּקַ֖ם <S%H6965><s%> was reared up הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> [that] the tabernacle

וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> reared up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֗ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and fastened אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדָנָ֔יו <S%H134><s%> his sockets וַיָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> and set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְרָשָׁ֔יו <S%H7175><s%> the boards וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> thereof and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִיחָ֑יו <S%H1280><s%> in the bars וַיָּ֖קֶם <S%H6965><s%> thereof and reared up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמּוּדָֽיו׃ <S%H5982><s%> his pillars

וַיִּפְרֹ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> And he spread abroad אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹ֙הֶל֙ <S%H168><s%> the tent עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> over the tabernacle וַיָּ֜שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִכְסֵ֥ה <S%H4372><s%> the covering הָאֹ֛הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tent עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> over מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> above כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> upon it as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses ס

וַיִּקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> And he took וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֵדֻת֙ <S%H5715><s%> the testimony אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <S%H727><s%> into the ark וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּדִּ֖ים <S%H905><s%> the staves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto הָאָרֹ֑ן <S%H727><s%> on the ark וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הָאָרֹ֖ן <S%H727><s%> upon the ark מִלְמָֽעְלָה׃ <S%H4605><s%> above

וַיָּבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> And he brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָרֹן֮ <S%H727><s%> the ark אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַמִּשְׁכָּן֒ <S%H4908><s%> into the tabernacle וַיָּ֗שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> and set up אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> פָּרֹ֣כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail הַמָּסָ֔ךְ <S%H4539><s%> of the covering וַיָּ֕סֶךְ <S%H5526><s%> and covered עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָעֵד֑וּת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses ס

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשֻּׁלְחָן֙ <S%H7979><s%> the table בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> upon the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle צָפֹ֑נָה <S%H6828><s%> northward מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> the vail

וַיַּעֲרֹ֥ךְ <S%H6186><s%> in order עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and עֵ֥רֶךְ <S%H6187><s%> And he set לֶ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> upon it before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses ס

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמְּנֹרָה֙ <S%H4501><s%> the candlestick בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tent מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation נֹ֖כַח <S%H5227><s%> over against הַשֻּׁלְחָ֑ן <S%H7979><s%> the table עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> and יֶ֥רֶךְ <S%H3409><s%> on the side הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> southward

וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he lighted הַנֵּרֹ֖ת <S%H5216><s%> the lamps לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses ס

וַיָּ֛שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֥ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַזָּהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> the golden בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tent מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before הַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> the vail

וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <S%H6999><s%> And he burnt עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and קְטֹ֣רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense סַמִּ֑ים <S%H5561><s%> sweet כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> thereon as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses פ
וַיָּ֛שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> And he set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָסַ֥ךְ <S%H4539><s%> the hanging הַפֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door לַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle
